titles.title: A bill to provide for reimbursement for business revenue lost as a result of a facility being used as an emergency shelter for Katrina Survivors.
A bill to provide for reimbursement for business revenue lost as a result of a facility being used as an emergency shelter for Katrina Survivors.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 207.

bill.summary: Directs the President to reimburse an individual or entity that owns or operates a facility used as an emergency shelter for Hurricane Katrina survivors for 100% of the business revenue lost as a result of cancellation of revenue-raising events during the Hurricane Katrina disaster period as determined by the state involved.
